#define I_LTDC_GETINFO
 

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ I_LTDC_GETINFO

#define I_LTDC_GETINFO

This request gets the attributes of the device.

Example:

display_info_t info;
ioctl(fildes, I_DISPLAY_GETINFO, &info);
